title: Where does Adult Swim get its ironic and self-referential humor from?
body: From <a href="http://www.fortwayne.com/mld/newssentinel/8304156.htm">The Simpsons</a>, of course!  Here's a good quote: "The only thing that's keeping them from being a piece of art like `Don Quixote' or `A Midsummer Night's Dream' is a couple hundred years."
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-03-30

Where does Adult Swim get its ironic and self-referential humor from?

From
